channel.title: macOS on My Blog
channel.description: Recent content in macOS on My Blog

item.title: Wechat AntiDuck
item.description: There’s this annoying feature on macOS that would lower the media volume when you are on a call or Facetime which appears in Wechat, Facetime or Skype. Basically, you can’t listen to YT when you are on a call. To avoid that, Wechat-AntiDuck comes to help. Fix “No permission to open” sudo codesign --force --deep --sign - "/Applications/WeChat.app" This doesn’t work with the following warning. /Applications/WeChat.app: the codesign_allocate helper tool cannot be found or used Tried re-installing the homebrew version, no luck.
